title: Intermediate Course on Developing Patient Education Materials Using Visual Explanations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and experience with graphic tools
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course applying math curriculum-based visual design methodologies to patient education

learning_goals: Learners can create infographics explaining medical concepts in accordance with mathematical ratios/proportional expressions.
Learners can design visual hierarchies tailored to the comprehension level of target patients.
Learners can produce educational materials using digital authoring tools in a BYOD environment and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
